wmndsErrorMessageProps.name: id
wmndsErrorMessageProps.description: Id attribute to add to the error message span tag.

wmndsErrorMessageProps.name: contentText
wmndsErrorMessageProps.description: Required. Text to use within the error message. If contentHTML is supplied, this is ignored.

wmndsErrorMessageProps.name: contentHTML
wmndsErrorMessageProps.description: Required. HTML to use within the error message

wmndsErrorMessageProps.name: classes
wmndsErrorMessageProps.description: Classes to add to the error message span tag.
